genresAdvancedInfo.name: spanish classical
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Spanish classical music refers to the classical music tradition in Spain, which dates back to the Renaissance period. It includes works by Spanish composers such as Isaac Albéniz, Manuel de Falla, and Joaquín Rodrigo, as well as adaptations of traditional Spanish folk music. Spanish classical music is characterized by its use of Spanish rhythms and melodies, as well as its incorporation of instruments such as the guitar and castanets. It is often performed by

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify

index.what-is-spotify-top-content: The {strongOpen}easiest{strongClose} way to get stats about your listening history on Spotify. Find out and share your {strongOpen}top artists{strongClose}, {strongOpen}tracks{strongClose}, and {strongOpen}genres{strongClose}.
